if __name__ == "__main__":

on the link below to update your login information:

The email also creates a sense of fear by stating that if they do not update their login information, their account may be suspended.

The link provided in the email is actually a phishing website that is designed to look like the real login page of the user's account. The website will ask the user for their login credentials, and once they enter them, the attacker will have access to the user's account.
